subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The only thing that will work around Pebble Beach this week will be tee shots in the fairway, crisply struck irons, very good and somewhat lucky chip shots and dead-eye putting.
snippet: The only thing that will work around Pebble Beach this week will be tee shots in the fairway, crisply struck irons, very good and somewhat lucky chip shots and dead-eye putting.
